TopicTitle: KSP doesn't create any new savefiles

Articles.Content:
So... my game just doesnt save animore.
I have gone to the entirety of minmus's biomes, and i'm in my way on mun's biomes. got 3 there and im comming back to kerbin. but my game doesnt quicksave, neither when i go "esc - save game - save" nor "F5".

And at any autosave events (like returning to KSC midflight or entering the tracking station) just doesnt proceed.
I can load games just fine, but the game just doesn't create a save file (autosave, manual quicksave or f5 quicksave). What is happening?

 

[EDIT]: all the addons are fine, up-to-date, the rest of game is working just fine regardless this unique issue of creating savefiles

Edited June 16, 2018 by Morgueço
Have you been tampering with any of the game files? I'm talking about folders other than GameData and Plugins.
